gplus_date_edited.description: Text in parentheses after the date for edited posts, e.g. '17:09 (modificado)'

gplus_date_long_prefix.description: Text that needs to be preserved when abbreviating date text.  Used with gplus_date_long_suffix.  A '.' is added after, e.g. 'Yesterday' becomes 'Yest.'

gplus_date_long_suffix.description: Text that is dropped when abbreviating date text.  Used with gplus_date_long_prefix.  The text is replaced with a '.', e.g. 'Yesterday' becomes 'Yest.'
